Keeps the GlyphTube Count toy running

How to enable on Glyph Matrix:

1) Go to Phone Settings → Glyph Interface → tap "Glyph Toys"

2) Top right click on the Sorting Icon (next to the gear). Add "Subscriber Count" and hit back

3) Click on "Subscriber Count" and see Matrix display your subscriber count!
